de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.tools

Class ImageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.tools.ImageConverter

  • public class ImageConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    ImageConverter converts images between AWT, Swing and SWT with support for Apple retina displays. These high resolution displays need special image preparation.

    This converter depends on the ImageConverter.class by Michael Karneim from beanfabrics.org, who implements the basic functionality for converting the AWT/Swing Images and Icons to SWT ImageDate objects.

    The functions for retina support are added from IconLoader by Konstantin Bulenkov from http://bulenkov.com/2013/06/23/retina-support-in-oracle-jdk-1-7/ with jar.

    A couple of additional methods was implemented for RyCON.

    Changes:

    • 2: number improvements and clean up
    • 1: basic implementation
    Since:
    1

        public org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image convertToImage(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display,

        Convert an image (GIF, JPG, PGN, ...) to Image object from swt Image.
        Parameters:

        Image object
